title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:30 <florinciu> has quit  
01:13 <esdaniel> has joined #xwiki  
01:13 <esdaniel> hi, what's the story behind $pdocurl ? http://tinyurl.com/26mxdkg  
01:16 <@cjdelisle> I don't know but perhaps it is the script here XWIKI-1255 misbehaving and leaving a link which googlebot follows?  
01:17 <esdaniel> hmm, well if you check out some of those pages you'll see they're created by wikiguests, odd behaviour  
01:18 <@cjdelisle> Empty pages may not exist and it's possible it's not being reported correctly.  
01:19 <@cjdelisle> Not sure myself, I'd have to look in to it closer.  
01:19 <esdaniel> indeed - it looks to be a rather dumb behaviour  
01:19 <esdaniel> not sure how 1255 relates either  
01:20 <esdaniel> i noticed the page been created recently on our wiki so removed guest rights to author on particular spaces  
01:20 <@cjdelisle> http://xwiki.cs.colorado.edu/bin/viewrev/XWiki/$pdocurl <-- this for example is /viewrev/ of a page which doesn't actually exist.  
01:20 <esdaniel> they probably deleted it  
01:21 <esdaniel> anyhow, happy hunting - i hope it's not some script kiddy having fun with xwikis  
01:21 <esdaniel> ttfn  
01:21 <esdaniel> has left #xwiki  
01:21 <@cjdelisle> I think it's a broken link created by the script I linked and googlebot follows the broken link and reports the page even though it's not there.  
01:22 <@cjdelisle> maybe the thing to do is set a 404 if the page does not exist.  
01:28 <abusenius> has quit

11:40 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <Menso> has joined #xwiki  
12:03 <+lucaa> devs, how long is it normal for the reporting tool daily to take on hudson?  
12:04 <+lucaa> it seems hudson is blocked by these jobs that started a very long time ago  
12:04 <+lucaa> and the lucene plugin build, or something, that took already 20 hours  
12:06 <+lucaa> I killed the lucene job  
12:46 <+tmortagne> mflorea: FIY macros parameters descriptor changed a bit: Class< ? > getType(); has been deprecated by Type getParameterType();  
12:47 <+tmortagne> java.lang.reflect.Type provide generic informations  
13:02 <florinciu> has joined #xwiki  
13:05 <+mflorea> tmortagne: I see, I'll have to update the editor code  
13:07 <mflorea> has quit  
14:45 <lucaa> has quit
